page.description: Fires when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse cursor is over the control.

description.p: An object that contains properties and methods for inspecting and manipulating the browser event. This object can be referenced in JavaScript added to the event, either through Action Javascript or using *[ui:Text Mode]*.

discussion.p: The *[ui:onMouseDown]* event is triggered when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse cursor is over the control.
